programme.title: TFC Kids Zone
programme.desc: A programme block filled with animated short stories, nursery rhymes and songs, as well as Filipino language lessons, TFC Kids' Zone promises a rich treasure trove of learning and discovery that parents and their young ones will find enriching and empowering.

programme.title: Roja
programme.desc: A paradise like no other - La Playa Roja is your ultimate escape! But behind its beauty lies danger, and soon, you'll see RED. Are you ready for the fight to survive?

programme.title: FPJ's Batang Quiapo
programme.desc: A young man rises to be one of the biggest outlaws in the neighbourhood while he navigates his way in life to survive in Quiapo. Hoping to earn the affection of his parents, his feat draws him closer to the truth about his identity.

programme.title: What Lies Beneath
programme.desc: The lives of four individuals are turned upside down after they witness the murder of their friend. They band together to put the alleged killer behind bars, but years later, the imprisoned man seeks revenge, unraveling dark secrets that test their loyalty and survival.

programme.title: Goin' Bulilit S15
programme.desc: This comical spin-off of the 80s comedy programme Goin' Bananas is currently the Philippines' most successful children's comedy show, created and directed by one of Goin' Bananas' original stars, Bobot Mortiz.

programme.title: TV Patrol Express Live
programme.desc: Comprehensive and incisive, TV Patrol is the benchmark in Philippines news journalism, bringing you the most relevant news delivered by the country's best news anchors.

programme.title: BRGY S4
programme.desc: BRGY features interesting and humorous stories about Filipinos and businesses in North America.

programme.title: TV Patrol Live
programme.desc: Comprehensive and incisive, TV Patrol is the benchmark in Philippines news journalism, bringing you the most relevant news delivered by the country's best news anchors.

programme.title: FPJ's Batang Quiapo
programme.desc: A young man rises to be one of the biggest outlaws in the neighbourhood while he navigates his way in life to survive in Quiapo. Hoping to earn the affection of his parents, his feat draws him closer to the truth about his identity.

programme.title: Roja

programme.title: What Lies Beneath
programme.desc: The lives of four individuals are turned upside down after they witness the murder of their friend. They band together to put the alleged killer behind bars, but years later, the imprisoned man seeks revenge, unraveling dark secrets that test their loyalty and survival.

programme.title: It's Showtime
programme.desc: Hosted by an all-star cast, It's Showtime is a variety show unlike any other. Watch as people from all over come on stage to showcase their skills and creativity in this one-of-a-kind talent show full of fun and prizes.

programme.title: Agripreneur
programme.desc: Features the local agriculture industry from practical tips on animal raising and planting to stories of entrepreneurs behind the country's most profitable farms and agricultural spaces.

programme.title: Imbestigador
programme.desc: An investigative show highlighting societal issues like corruption, local government problems, illegal activities, poverty, disloyalty, cleanliness, education, wasted public funds, youth, and public health and safety.

programme.title: Cayetano in Action with Boy Abunda
programme.desc: Senator Alan Peter Cayetano and host Boy Abunda engage in insightful conversations on current events, social issues, and interviews with various guests. The show combines thought-provoking discussions with entertainment, offering diverse perspectives on important topics.

programme.title: Dokumentaryo
programme.desc: A compilation of the award-winning I-Witness documentaries.

programme.desc: The noontime daily newscast that delivers the hottest news and happenings in the country.

programme.desc: A reality documentary program that features honest and unpretentious stories of simple people and takes an unfiltered look at various social issues.

programme.desc: Offers practical tips on handling household finances and earning additional income.

programme.title: Unica Hija
programme.desc: The tragic death of his daughter and the ensuing breakdown of his marriage leads a scientist to clone his daughter, with the hope of bringing his wife back to him. However, others take interest in his daring but morally questionable experiment, leading to his demise. Bianca, the clone, is taken in by an unsuspecting couple, and is raised as their own. Years later, the cloning is discovered. Bianca

programme.title: Cruz vs. Cruz
programme.desc: is a story of the two families of Ryan Cruz. He left his original family in the Philippines to work abroad and provide for them. During his time as an OFW, he meets a woman who lures him to marry her after she gets pregnant.

programme.title: Hating Kapatid
programme.desc: The series follows twin siblings Tyron and Belle, separated at birth and raised in vastly different worlds. When fate brings them together, their bond sparks a journey of discovery, love, and rivalry-- unaware of the truth that binds them.

programme.title: Sanggang-Dikit FR
programme.desc: Two law-enforcers, each burdened by personal loss, are forced to work together when a high-profile murder implicates an action star. Their investigation unravels a deeper conspiracy linking their own families to the crimes, testing their loyalty, trust, and pursuit of justice.

programme.desc: Two law-enforcers, each burdened by personal loss, are forced to work together when a high-profile murder implicates an action star. Their investigation unravels a deeper conspiracy linking their own families to the crimes, testing their loyalty, trust, and pursuit of justice.

programme.title: Reporter's Notebook
programme.desc: Features stories culled from the reporters' own files, news that people did not see on the news programs. The show is written and hosted by the network's aggressive young reporters and hosted by the network.

programme.title: Kapuso Mo Jessica Soho
programme.desc: Features the lighter side of veteran journalist, Jessica Soho, and highlights insightful stories of a wide range of topics

programme.title: Cruz Vs. Cruz
programme.desc: is a story of the two families of Ryan Cruz. He left his original family in the Philippines to work abroad and provide for them. During his time as an OFW, he meets a woman who lures him to marry her after she gets pregnant.

programme.title: It's Showtime
programme.desc: 'It's Showtime' is a hit variety program that thrives on spontaneity and animated conversations.

programme.title: Maka
programme.desc: It is a youth-oriented drama series that follows the lives of six high school students enrolled in the Arts & Performance section of public school, Douglas Mac Arthur High School for the Arts aka. MAKA.

programme.title: Wish Ko Lang
programme.desc: The first wish-granting program on Philippine television, featuring inspiring stories of ordinary Filipinos as they struggle to overcome extraordinary situations.

programme.title: Cruz Vs. Cruz
programme.desc: is a story of the two families of Ryan Cruz. He left his original family in the Philippines to work abroad and provide for them. During his time as an OFW, he meets a woman who lures him to marry her after she gets pregnant.

programme.title: Tadhana
programme.desc: An Overseas Filipino Workers themed weekly anthology that will dramatize the colorful, romantic, heroic, and inspiring stories of OFWs.

programme.title: Regal Studio Presents
programme.desc: A collection of weekly specials which feature timely, feel-good stories.

programme.title: Resibo: Walang Lusot Ang May Atraso
programme.desc: A public service program aimed at giving a voice to the public's grievances and complaints, exposing wrongdoing, and providing concrete resolutions.

programme.title: Pbb Teens
programme.desc: The TV reality competition follows the same premise as its many foreign counterparts around the world wherein a number of Filipinos volunteered to live inside a house for a certain number of days.

programme.title: 24 Oras Weekend
programme.desc: A weekend report on the latest happenings in the Philippines and around the world.

programme.title: Maka
programme.desc: It is a youth-oriented drama series that follows the lives of six high school students enrolled in the Arts & Performance section of public school, Douglas Mac Arthur High School for the Arts aka. MAKA.

programme.title: Pepito Manaloto, Tuloy Ang Kuwento
programme.desc: The continuing comedic chronicle of the life of Pepito Manaloto, a lucky multimillion lotto winner, his family, and the merry mix of neighbors and colleagues.

programme.title: Bblgang
programme.desc: A refreshing, exciting and funny show with an assortment of gags, spoofs, and comic performances.

programme.title: The Boobay And Tekla Show
programme.desc: A comedy program that features a wide range of hilarious discussion topics in pop culture, entertainment, current events, society, sports, cyber culture and more.

programme.title: I
programme.desc: A documentary on the different issues in society hosted by a set of trusted broadcast journalists in the country

programme.title: The Boobay And Tekla Show
programme.desc: A comedy program that features a wide range of hilarious discussion topics in pop culture, entertainment, current events, society, sports, cyber culture and more.

programme.title: Global Pinoy Unlimited
programme.desc: Global Pinoy Unlimited features community news, Pinoy headliners and their significant contributions to the community, as well as special kababayan and Kapuso happenings across the globe.

programme.title: Wish Ko Lang
programme.desc: The first wish-granting program on Philippine television, featuring inspiring stories of ordinary Filipinos as they struggle to overcome extraordinary situations.

programme.title: Encantadia Chronicles: Sang'gre Marathon
programme.desc: The series is a spin-off to the Philippine television fantasy drama series, Encantadia.

programme.title: Magpakailanman
programme.desc: A drama anthology featuring real-life inspired stories.

programme.title: Pepito Manaloto, Tuloy Ang Kuwento
programme.desc: The continuing comedic chronicle of the life of Pepito Manaloto, a lucky multimillion lotto winner, his family, and the merry mix of neighbors and colleagues.

programme.title: GMA Pinoy Blockbuster: 'Bontoc'
programme.desc: Set in the Cordillera mountains, a culturally rich story of tribal conflict, tradition, and the fight for peace.

programme.title: GMA Pinoy Blockbuster: 'Single Bells'
programme.desc: Two friends with contrasting relationship views join a self-love group. They navigate choices between new paths or remaining single.

programme.title: Juan Tamad Jr.
programme.desc: Child wonder Niño Muhlach plays the precocious Juan whose lovable antics as a lazy boy translates into a rip-roaring comedy feature film. But Juan's carefree lifestyle halts when he is kidnapped by a child labor gang. What will happen if Juan is able to use his laziness to be able to escape?

programme.title: Pati Ba Pintig Ng Puso? (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Eddie Garcia was at his best as the autocratic patriarch who ruled his family and all the people around him with an iron hand. But his grandson would have none of this.

programme.title: Takot Ako Sa Darling Ko
programme.desc: It was love at first sight between Joey de Leon and Jenny Syquia but there was a big problem. She belonged to a family of vampires who had reformed and were now on their way to becoming normal human beings.

programme.title: Minsan May Pangarap
programme.desc: This is the true story of Aldo Guce and his family, and how they stood upand won against bigotry and the American system of justice. Based on a well-publicized case known among Filipinos in the United States.

programme.title: Saan Darating Ang Umaga (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: With Shane now already grown up and in college, her parents decided to adopt a little boy to complete their family. But after the excitement of his arrival has worn off, Shane began to have feelings of jealousy towards the boy her parents were now so enchanted with.

programme.title: Sa Bawat Tunog Ng Kampana
programme.desc: Rodel (Philip Salvador) suspects his father did not die during a mine collapse as his employer Don Gonzalo (Vic Diaz) claims. If we consider that Rodel's father is a cook, the son's suspicions are justified.

programme.title: Lipa \"Arandia\" Massacre
programme.desc: In the movie, Vilma played the role of Helen Arandia, who was brutally murdered along with her two daughters in Lipa, Batangas. The movie is not a massacre movie per se but which main thrust is on the beautiful love story of the couple.

programme.title: No Blood, No Surrender
programme.desc: Because of a death bed promise to his best friend, Samson (Palito) journeys to San Sepulkro to look for his friend's daughter Melinda (Michelle Aquino) and take care of her. Will Samson's antics be enough to elude their pursuers and bring Mercado to justice?

programme.title: Dunkin Donato
programme.desc: Donato and Buknoy has to win the championship of the interbarangay league. The money will be used to fund the many beneficial projects for the community. Will their talent be enough to win the game without having to resort to Magical Power?

programme.title: Gising Na Ang Higanteng Natutulog
programme.desc: Sgt. Delfin Guerrero (Andy Poe), an honest, kind-hearted and dedicated motorcycle cop who took on corrupt politicians in his mission to uphold the law.

programme.title: Andres Manambit: Angkan Ng Matatapang
programme.desc: The true story of a law enforcer who did everything he could to uphold the law.

programme.title: Ang Pagbabalik Ni Pedro Penduko (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Pedro Penduko (Janno Gibbs) who was decreed by a hermit as the savior of the world, which was under an evil curse. To fulfill his destiny, he had to go back in time and fight with the malevolent pair from hell, Lucifero and Lucifera.

programme.title: Makuha Ka Sa Tingin
programme.desc: Elcid (Robin Padilla) and his buddy, Tembong (Dennis Padilla), decided to got to Manila to search for greener pastures in Manila.

programme.title: Babangon Ako't Dudurugin Kita
programme.desc: Via and Alfred were kindred souls. They would do anything to get what they wanted no matter what the cost. He wanted a future in politics. She came from a political family who wanted to continue wielding power. They were made for each other.

programme.title: Narito Ang Puso Ko (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Ellen and Louie are estranged lovers whose son is accidentally shot by Tato, a son of a prominent politician. However, in their constant vigil besides their comatose son, their feelings towards each other are rekindled.

programme.title: Matinik Na Bading, Mga Syokeng Buking
programme.desc: Apolinario and his uncle Boyong came from a family of barbers. They earned very little and in order to make more, they pretended to be gay.

programme.title: Apoy Sa Iyong Kandungan
programme.desc: Ramona (Vivian Velez) is ecstatic when she marries Rommel (Ronaldo Valdez). But Ramona remains a virgin wife as Rommel turns out to be a closet homosexual with a boyfriend, Alex (Mark Gil).

programme.title: Lagablab Sa Paraiso
programme.desc: A nurse and her cousin, a nightclub dancer, a honeymooning couple and two male prisoners. Survivors of a shipwreck, they are trapped together in an island. Of different backgrounds and personalities, can they set aside their differences to survive roughing it up in this island?

programme.title: Oo Na Sige Na
programme.desc: When their relationship was discovered, Shirley was made to choose between father and boyfriend,Bonggoy.

programme.title: Puga
programme.desc: Willy (Rudy Fernandez) tags along with Mogan (Paquito Diaz) and Waldo (Ruel Vernal) when they escaped from prison. Outside, the three continue with their criminal activities to support themselves. Soon, Willy falls in love with Mogan's niece, Leonor (Cherie Gil). Can Willy turn the tables on Mogan and Waldo and bring them to justice instead?

programme.title: Masdan Mo Ang Mga Bata
programme.desc: Neneng was raped and eventually killed. Ruben was determined to exact revenge at all cost for the sake of his child and the other victims.

programme.title: Mukhang Bungo
programme.desc: Boboy (Redford White) is a stuntman living with his mother and father. After his father is killed, he takes a job as a security guard and becomes a vigilante. With the help of his fellow policemen, he tries to track down the syndicate.

programme.title: Boy Recto
programme.desc: When a busy street - Claro M. Recto becomes living hell for students and young people, Boy Recto (Ronnie Ricketts) undertake a dangerous rescue mission to save the youngstersfrom attack by various gangsters.
